mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO log ( user_id, action_type, action_description, created_at, object_type ) VALUES
(#{log.userId}, #{log.actionType}, #{log.actionDescription}, #{log.createdAt}, #{log.objectType})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as action_count, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as action_date FROM log WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY user_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY action_date, action_count DESC
SELECT action_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM log WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY action_type

SELECT user_id, action_type, COUNT(*) as error_count FROM log WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND action_description LIKE '%error%' GROUP BY user_id, action_type ORDER BY error_count DESC

SELECT action_type, COUNT(*) as action_count, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%H') as hour_of_day FROM log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY action_type, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%H') ORDER BY hour_of_day, action_type

SELECT action_type, object_type, COUNT(*) as operation_count, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as operation_date FROM log WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY action_type, object_type, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY operation_date DESC

SELECT action_type, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MICROSECOND, created_at, created_at)) as avg_response_time, MAX(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MICROSECOND, created_at, created_at)) as max_response_time, MIN(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MICROSECOND, created_at, created_at)) as min_response_time FROM log WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY action_type
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_logs, SUM(LENGTH(action_description)) as total_description_length, MIN(created_at) as earliest_log, MAX(created_at) as latest_log FROM log

SELECT created_at as login_time, action_description, object_type as login_type FROM log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND action_type = 3 -- LOGIN AND created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY created_at DESC
